attributes.action: Make the government pay the full 80% furlough due to legally forcing lockdowns!
attributes.additional_details: To make this fair for employees to have an income when laws for lockdown are being forced on the country and to stop employers having to spend money they don’t have due to not being able to open to make profits.
attributes.background: To take away employer contributions on furlough and to stop employers having to pay the extra 20% to make up the 80% for people to be paid when the government make lockdown rules due to employers not choosing to close!
